name: Nerf: Arena (Beta)
description:
Nerf: Arena is a wave-based shooter first built for a project on my YouTube channel, QwertyKid. I plan on eventually adding multiple maps, blasters, and other features to the game.

Planned Future Features:

  • Randomized enemy spawns (to avoid enemy clumping)
  • Weapon and glove customization
  • Unlockable special reloads
  • More levels / intense enemies
  • Options menu / keybinds and graphics customization
  • Multiplayer???
  • Random bug fixes

Current Known Bugs:

  • Enemy clumping
  • Can't jump on anything but grass
  • Mouse doesn't disappear during game
